column2: 《HKEx》- 00373 ALLIED GROUP - Joint Announcement - (1) Proposed Privatisation of SHK IND by the Offeror by way of a Scheme of Arrangement (under Section 673 of the Companies Ordinance) in the form of a Takeover Offer and (2) Proposed Withdrawal of Listing of SHK IND Shares - Extension of Time for Despatch of the Scheme Document
